name: L'ABBAYE DES MORTS (MEGADRIVE/GENESIS) (POR 002)
description:
Megadrive port of the game created  by Locomalito and Gryzor in 2010, it is an icon of the homebrew development. It brought back the mechanics of the videoadventures so classic in the 80’s microcomputers. A demanding game where you will have to control Jean Reymond, a  Cathar monk , to escape to a fatal fate at the hands of the Crusade knights who want to hunt him. It was originally released for PC and then ported to a multitude of systems. Tour the author's website for more information: http://www.locomalito.com 

We want from this moment to thank all who have collaborated to make this edition possible, because with their selfless work and dedication for months have made possible that today you can buy L'Abbaye des morts for Megadrive (Locomalito, Gryzor, Mun, Darkhorace, Fran, Dani Nevado, Alfonso, Igor, Gerardo, Manuel Gómez, Manuel Millán, Rubén, Bruce, Stef, José Zanni, David Lara , Leander, Jose Antonio, Borja, Migue, Salva, Ricky and Felipe), but above all ... thanks to you!
